docs.lead_paragraph: Combating the 1-cent-a-quart increase in the price of milk ordered for Monday by the State Department of Markets, Mayor LaGuardia said yesterday that he had arranged with the Borden Company for the distribution of 50,000 quarts of milk at 8 cents a quart here beginning on Monday and daily thereafter.

headline.main: 8c MILK PROMISED BY MAYOR IN FIGHT ON PRICE INCREASE; 50,000 Quarts a Day Will Be Sold in Sanitary Cartons Through Health Stations. STATE ACTION DENOUNCED LaGuardia Says It Failed to Seek Aid That Would Have Averted the Rise. 8C MILK PROMISED FOR CITY BY MAYOR

docs.abstract: Arranges with Mayor LaGuardia for 8c milk
